EmailTemplate.description: Notifies CS partner that a CS contract has been signed
EmailTemplate.name: CS Partner - Contract Signed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} has signed their Community Solar contract!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.BS_Sales_ID_c},
{!Opportunity.Name} has signed their Community Solar contract!
You will receive an email from us when {!Opportunity.Name}'s contract has been fully executed.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy. - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.817.2703 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
